amendatorysection.para: The county of Holt is bounded as follows: Commencing at the southwest corner of township twenty-five, north, of range sixteen, west; thence east to the southeast corner of township twenty-five, north, of range nine, west; thence north to the middle of the main channel of the Niobrara River, thence up said channel to a point where the second guide meridian intersects the same; thence south along said second guide meridian, to the place of beginning.

annotation.para: Attempt to extend boundary in 1883 was void. State ex rel. Norton v. Van Camp and Kruse, 36 Neb. 9, 54 N.W. 113 (1893).
